EXT_float_blend.summary: The WebGL API's EXT_float_blend extension allows blending and draw buffers with 32-bit floating-point components.

remarks.para: WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para: This extension is available to both, {{domxref("WebGLRenderingContext", "WebGL1", "", 1)}} and {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL2", "", 1)}} contexts. However, to use it, you need to enable the use of 32-bit floating-point draw buffers by enabling the extension (for WebGL1) or (for WebGL2). Doing so automatically enables EXT_float_blend as well, if and only if EXT_float_blend is also supported. Support for EXT_color_buffer_float does not imply support for EXT_float_blend.

remarks.para: With this extension enabled, calling or with blending enabled and a draw buffer with 32-bit floating-point components will no longer result in an INVALID_OPERATION error.
